support.title: Donator
support.descp:
You are so thrilled with this project that you just want to contribute more (or less) than the pledges allow you.
Please, choose this pledge to support us with £1. If you want to contribute more, enter your donation above (MAKE PLEDGE WITHOUT REWARD).
Your kindness will be rewarded with a kiss from Arcadia. With love, of course.
Besides, you get access to the late pledge manager after the campaign ends, just in case you change your mind and decide you want a copy of the game.
INCLUDES:
A kiss from Arcadia (e-postcard)
Access to the late pledge manager

support.title: Friend
support.descp:
You're neither a gamer nor you ever want to be one. But you love us - or our game - and therefore you want to support this project. Thank you very much! We will send you A SHORT STORY FROM ARCADIA TENEBRA, written just for you.
Besides, you get access to the late pledge manager after the campaign ends just in case you change your mind and decide you want a copy of the game.
INCLUDES:
A short story from Arcadia Tenebra (PDF)
A kiss from Arcadia (e-postcard)
Access to the late pledge manager

support.title: Adventurer
support.descp:
You're always looking for something new, exciting, and funny.
Your curiosity brought you here and you said to yourself: "Well, well... Look at this! It appears to be something new, exciting, and funny! Wrap me one to go!" There you are: 1 copy of the board game Arcadia Tenebra with all unlocked stretch goals. Nothing less, nothing more!
Shipping (£11/$15) will be charged after the campaign through the pledge manager.
INCLUDES:
1 copy of board game Arcadia Tenebra
All unlocked stretch goals
A short story from Arcadia Tenebra (PDF)
A kiss from Arcadia (e-postcard)
Access to the late pledge manager

support.title: Legend
support.descp:
You've always felt you are somehow different, that there is more to you than meets the eye, that you are meant to do much more than you are doing right now. The moment you step in Arcadia Tenebra - you get a revelation! Now you simply know you are a Legend. The only problem is that nobody else knows that.
But luckily for you, we are here! By the powerful magic of creation that we wield so irresponsibly, WE WILL MAKE YOU A LEGEND BY CREATING AN NPC BASED ON YOU. Now, isn't that great? (After the campaign, we will send you a questionnaire with some silly semi-personal questions. Based on your answers, we will create a non-playable character that will have a name based on your own).
After your departure, many generations of players will remember you every time they stumble upon a character inspired by You!
You gain immortality for a mere 500$.
Free shipping!
INCLUDES:
NPC based on you
1 copy of board game Arcadia Tenebra
All unlocked stretch goals
A short story from Arcadia Tenebra (PDF)
A kiss from Arcadia (e-postcard)

support.title: True Arcadian!
support.descp:
You are either a rich relative of ours, or a friend (of a kind we are not aware of having), or you want to become our rich relative or a friend, or you are simply and completely out of your mind. That's OK with us! All good-willed people with a lot of money can become our friends or relatives (select freely which one you want to become) by choosing this pledge! But that's not all!
WE WILL TAKE YOU ON A THREE DAY TRIP through Arcadia Tenebra, just like we would do with a relative or a friend. You will eat, drink, travel, and sleep in an Arcadian fashion: enjoy a lot of good local food, drinks, and breath-taking nature. A trip you will surely remember on your dying bed. If you survive it.
(Travel costs to Croatia not included.)
Your copy of the game will be handed to you by the creators, in person.
INCLUDES:
Three day trip to Arcadia
1 copy of board game Arcadia Tenebra
All unlocked stretch goals
A short story from Arcadia Tenebra (PDF)
A kiss from Arcadia (e-postcard)

support.title: Adventurer
support.descp:
You're always looking for something new, exciting, and funny.
Your curiosity brought you here and you said to yourself: "Well, well... Look at this! It appears to be something new, exciting, and funny! Wrap me one to go!" There you are: 1 copy of the board game Arcadia Tenebra with all unlocked stretch goals. Nothing less, nothing more!
Shipping (£11/$15) will be charged after the campaign through the pledge manager.
INCLUDES:

All unlocked stretch goals
A short story from Arcadia Tenebra (PDF)
A kiss from Arcadia (e-postcard)
Access to the late pledge manager

support.title: Random Fun Generator PDF
support.descp:
One copy of Random Fun Generator, a collection of over 20 dice games, in PDF. You will need a Warehouse 23 account to retrieve the PDF from your library. If you do not have a Warehouse 23 account, you will receive a single download link for the PDF.
No physical add-ons allowed.
INCLUDES:
Random Fun Generator PDF
No Stretch Goals

support.title: Random Fun Generator Book
support.descp:
One copy of Random Fun Generator in print. This wire-bound 76-page 7" x 10" book includes the rules for over 20 new dice games. (Please see description, at left.) Also includes a PDF copy of the book. You will need a Warehouse 23 account to retrieve the PDF from your library. If you do not have a Warehouse 23 account, you will receive a single download link for the PDF.
Shipping is charged separately. Please see the FAQ for shipping information. You will pay for shipping in BackerKit, after the Kickstarter campaign closes.
INCLUDES:
Random Fun Generator PDF
Random Fun Generator Book
No Stretch Goals

support.title: Holiday Add On Level
support.descp:
Please read the Holiday Add On section on the campaign description page. This is an opportunity to share Dr. Finn's Games with friends and family. I am offering the low costs so that you can give a Dr. Finn's game to another person as a gift. I am relying on the honor system that you plan to give the games as a gift.
To ensure on-time delivery, I am limited this reward to 75 backers.

support.title: Level 1
support.descp: Everyone who donated $1 will get a place of honor and appreciation with their names proudly printed in the pages of the finished game.

support.title: Level 2
support.descp: As a $10 backer your name will appear in a place of honor and appreciation in the pages of the finished game. You will also get a free PDF copy of the Raven of the Scythe Core Rules.

support.title: Level 3
support.descp: For those who support this game at $25 you will get a place of honor and appreciation in the pages of the finished game. You will also get a free PDF copy of the Raven of the Scythe core rules as well as the Book of Enounters.

support.title: Level 4
support.descp:
If you are willing to support me and my work at this level, I can never thank you enough. Your name will appear in the finished game at the highest place of honor. You will also get free pdf copy of the Raven of the Scythe Core Rules and the Book of Encounters 1 month before I release it to the general public.
Your copy will also include a personalized thank you message.

support.descp: At this prestigious level you will receive 1 copy of Kneecapped, a signed copy of the signature deck featured in our videos, AND a signed full sized art book featuring both the art from Kneecapped and behind the scenes info featuring our artist.

support.title: The Villagers

support.title: The Villagers, 2 copies

+ Two copies of The Villagers with all unlocked stretch goals.
+ FREE shipping worldwide.

support.title: CHAPTER ONE: MINIMAL BIRDEN
support.descp: For just a dollar, you can be a Birden in the Comments Cove all you want. Your 2 cents certainly carries a $1 value, right? This also gives you access to the pledge manager if you'd prefer to pledge after the campaign, but you must purchase a game to be able to select any add-ons.

support.title: CHAPTER TWO: THE GAME
support.descp:
Get STUFFED...The Game!
Includes all unlocked stretch goals.
Want more than one? Just increase the pledge amount and you can pick a second or third game in the pledge manager after the campaign.
*Shipping charged during pledge manager after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
INCLUDES:
STUFFED Game

support.title: CHAPTER THREE: WE GIVE A FLOCK
support.descp:
Get STUFFED...The Game, plus Three Birdens!
You pick TWO Birdens, and we'll give you a THIRD Birden of our choice! See Add-ons for selection.
Includes all unlocked stretch goals.
If you'd like more games or Birdens, simply increase your pledge amount and you can choose your items in the pledge manager after the campaign.
*Shipping charged during pledge manager after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
INCLUDES:
STUFFED Game
2× BIRDEN PLUSHY - Your choice
BIRDEN PLUSHY - Our Choice

support.title: CHAPTER FOUR: THE GREEDY BIRDEN
support.descp:
If you are Birdened by Greed, this tier is for you! Get STUFFED...The Game, plus all 9 Birden plushies including the KSE Birden, the Stuffed Collector's Coin, Coasters, and a Sugar Goat plushy, too! All for $13 off the normal Add-On cost, so you are basically getting the KSE Birden plushy free!
*Shipping charged during pledge manager after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
INCLUDES:
STUFFED Game
All EIGHT BIRDEN Plushies
SUGAR GOAT Plushy
STUFFED COLLECTOR'S COIN
KS EXCLUSIVE BIRDEN - DEPENDENCE
STUFFED COASTERS - Set of 4

support.title: BULLETIN ONE: THE CHOSEN!
support.descp:
Get STUFFED...The Game, plus All EIGHT Birdens! Exclusive Birden not included.
Includes all unlocked stretch goals.
*Shipping charged during pledge manager after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
INCLUDES:
STUFFED Game
All EIGHT BIRDEN Plushies

support.title: BULLETIN TWO: AWW, MY HERO!
support.descp:
Get STUFFED...The Game, plus a 5th Hero option card! She's no better than the rest, and isn't even intended for a 5th player. She's just a different option, but for FREE!
*Shipping charged during pledge manager after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
INCLUDES:
STUFFED Game
Bonus HERO Card

support.title: BULLETIN FOUR: GOT YOUR GOAT!
support.descp:
For our devoted backers! Get STUFFED...The Game and a Sugar Goat plushy!
$35 value for $28
Includes all unlocked stretch goals.
Want more than one? Just increase the pledge amount and you can pick a second or third game in the pledge manager after the campaign.
*Shipping charged during pledge manager after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
INCLUDES:
STUFFED Game
SUGAR GOAT Plushy

support.title: BULLETIN THREE: AREN'T YOU SPECIAL?
support.descp:
Get STUFFED...The Game in an exclusive box! Aren't all boxes created equal? This special signature box doesn't think so. This box cover will be designed with a limited illustration and features a signature space to be signed by the creator/s.
*Shipping charged during pledge manager after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
INCLUDES:
STUFFED Game with special SIGNATURE box

support.title: PRINT 'N PLAY
support.descp:
Print the high quality art version of the game yourself! We'll send you the files after they are sent to the printer in December.
INCLUDES:
Deluxe Print 'n Play files

support.title: RETAILER
support.descp:
Only available to retail stores, proof will be required.
After you pledge, we will contact you with further information.

support.title: GEARWORKS
support.descp:
Includes all unlocked stretch goals.
Add $20 for Playmat and $24 per extra copy of Gearworks. Limit 4 of each with no extra shipping to US/EU/CA/AU. If outside those regions or wanting more copies, message us for a shipping quote.
INCLUDES:
Gearworks Retail Edition
Deluxe Print 'n Play files

support.title: GEARWORKS DELUXE
support.descp:
Receive a limited Deluxe Edition of Gearworks! This will NOT be sold through distribution.
Includes all unlocked stretch goals.
Add $20 for Playmat and $34 per extra copy of Gearworks. Limit 4 of each with no extra shipping to US/EU/CA/AU. If outside those regions or wanting more copies, message us for a shipping quote.
INCLUDES:
Gearworks Deluxe Edition
Bonus Contraption Pack
Deluxe Print 'n Play files

support.title: TINKERER
support.descp:

Includes all unlocked stretch goals.
Add $20 for Playmat and $34 per extra copy of Gearworks. Limit 4 of each with no extra shipping to US/EU/CA/AU. If outside those regions or wanting more copies, message us for a shipping quote.
*Subject to publisher approval.
INCLUDES:
Your name on a Contraption card
Playmat
Gearworks Deluxe Edition
Bonus Contraption Pack
Deluxe Print 'n Play files

support.title: MASTER TINKERER
support.descp:
Create a Contraption of your own choosing* by working with Kirk and Yoma! All Deluxe backers will receive this card as part of the Bonus Contraption Pack.
Includes all unlocked stretch goals.
Add $20 for Playmat and $34 per extra copy of Gearworks. Limit 4 of each with no extra shipping to US/EU/CA/AU. If outside those regions or wanting more copies, message us for a shipping quote.

Playmat

project_data.project_name: Gearworks: A steampunk strategy card game

support.title: Print & Play for far far far away people
support.descp:
Interstellar service postage it's too expensive? This reward is for you! You will receive the full game, ready to print out and play! Also, I've had prepared a custom tuck box just for you far far far away people, so you can keep your fresh new Entropia printed and ready to play game in a fresh and new printed and ready to assemble and use tuck box! Amazing, yay?
*Multilanguage* if we hit the stretch goal.
INCLUDES:
Complete copy of the game in PDF format.
Ready to print and assemble tuck box "P&P edition only"

support.title: Entropia, The Card Game.
support.descp:
You get the game,
plus all the stretch goals (if any).
INCLUDES:
Entropia, The Card Game.

support.title: Entropia, The Card Game - Italy pick-Up
support.descp:
Attention please! No shipping here, only hand-delivery! This reward it's only for near near near people! You can pick-up for free your game at Modena play 2018, or in two (or maybe-more-but-I'm-not-sure) local stores in Friuli Venezia Giulia: Udine and near. Cheap!
INCLUDES:
Entropia, The Card Game.

support.title: Play 'n Print 'n Play 'n Print
support.descp:
From Backers to backers!
For this reward, the PnP will be send 2 weeks after the campaign end.
INCLUDES:
Entropia, The Card Game.
Complete copy of the game in PDF format.
Ready to print and assemble tuck box "P&P edition only"
Stickers!
Mini Expansion "Bidding for a Star"

support.title: 4x The exo-orbitant-party Enabler!
support.descp:
Save on expedition & get 1 copy signed!
Gather your friends and get a deal ^_^
INCLUDES:
4× Entropia, The Card Game.

support.title: BETA
support.descp:
The one and only ever printed deck for the beta testing! With digit errors on card texts! Why play well when you can play it wrong? :P
For people coming from tgc world i advise: the whole grading is VG (Very Good), we use only sleeves and matte!
Shipping free!
Will be shipped light fast, 2 weeks after campaign ends.
I can sign the copy, just ask!

support.title: High Five
support.descp: No reward. Just the highest of fives.

support.title: Epic Hero (Collector's Edition)

Get a copy of the Collectable version of STEM: Epic Heroes. Collector's Edition includes a book style box with alternative box art and a collectible foil card that is not included in the standard edition.
*** Also, any additional foil cards that result from the "Choose a Hero" tier are included in ALL Collector's Editions. ***

Choose a new hero to be added to the Collector's Edition as an additional collectible foil card. (Some restrictions apply)

support.title: Thanks + Updates!
support.descp:
You get a 100% pure genuine organic Thank You, as well as ongoing updates from the campaign.
INCLUDES:
Thanks!
Email updates

support.title: Print + Play!
support.descp:
The budget approach!
For this amount you'll get a PDF version of the game for you to print out, assemble and play at home.
INCLUDES:
Full game: print-and-play version

support.title: Full Game + FREE Worldwide Shipping!
support.descp:
You'll get a copy of ITCHY FEET: THE TRAVEL GAME including all five extensions, the Kickstarter exclusive, and FREE shipping to anywhere in the world!
To order multiple copies (makes a great gift!) just add $24 for each extra deck you'd like.
INCLUDES:
Itchy Feet: the Travel Game w/ all extensions
Limited run Kickstarter-exclusive playable character card
Full game: print-and-play version
FREE worldwide shipping!

support.title: Full Game - Signed Deck!
support.descp:
Pledge this amount to get your deck signed by Itchy Feet author and co-creator of the game, Malachi!
This is a LIMITED reward, so if you want the book as well please change your pledge to THIS one and add $25 for the book (sorry, I can't sign the books!).
Limit one signed deck per backer. For additional normal decks, add $24 per copy.
If you got the $99 reward, DON'T change it - your deck will come signed anyway!
INCLUDES:
Full game - deck signed by Malachi! (Limit 1 per backer)
Limited run Kickstarter-exclusive playable character card
Full game: print-and-play version
FREE worldwide shipping!

support.title: Full Game + Itchy Feet Comic Anthology!
support.descp:
Get the full game, and a copy of Vol 1-3 of the Itchy Feet comic - 150 pages of full-color travel and language delightfulness!
To order multiples, just add $49 for each extra deck + book you'd like (book ships separately from game, but shipping is free for both).
INCLUDES:
Itchy Feet: the Travel Game w/ all extensions
Limited run Kickstarter-exclusive playable character card
Itchy Feet: Volumes 1-3 Book (150 pages of full color comics)
Full game: print-and-play version
FREE worldwide shipping!

support.title: Signed Game + Omnibus Book + T-Shirt!
support.descp:
By popular demand - the ultimate fan package!
You get a deck, signed by the creator. You get a Kickstarter-exclusive omnibus book of EVERY Itchy Feet comic including Vol. 1-3, Vol. 4, the as-yet unreleased Vol. 5 and ALL mini-comics from this month. And finally you get a t-shirt with a wanderlust-inspiring Itchy Feet design! Hot dang!
And worldwide shipping is FREE!
(If you want just the omnibus or just the t-shirt, see below on the campaign page for details.)
INCLUDES:
Full game - deck signed by Malachi! (Limit 1 per backer)
Limited run Kickstarter-exclusive playable character card
Kickstarter-exclusive Omnibus Book (250 pages of color comics)!
Full game: print-and-play version
FREE worldwide shipping!

support.title: Full Game + Personalized Character Card!
support.descp:
Your own character card with an Itchy Feet-style portrait based on you, including a unique ability! (Ships separately from game, but shipping is free.)
Also makes a great gift!
INCLUDES:
Playable one-of-a-kind character card based on your likeness
Itchy Feet: the Travel Game w/ all extensions
Limited run Kickstarter-exclusive playable character card
Full game: print-and-play version
FREE worldwide shipping!

support.title: 10x decks!
support.descp:
For retailers, collectors, or anyone stockpiling their nuclear bunker.
INCLUDES:
10x copies of the full game + all extensions!
FREE worldwide shipping!

support.title: Unique, One-of-a-Kind Deck!
support.descp:
The entire deck, personalized just for you. Only one will be printed!
INCLUDES:
Custom-made, unique deck with your likeness on most of the cards
FREE worldwide shipping!

support.title: Sponsor!
support.descp:
For companies or organizations!
Your logo will appear on one of 24 spots on a non-playable "Sponsored By" card, shipped inside every copy of the game.
If you want your logo to take up two or more slots, you can! Just use another account to pledge at this reward tier and mention it's for the same company or org.
INCLUDES:
Your logo in the deck on a non-playable "Sponsored By" card
Your logo on the website near the rulebook
Itchy Feet: the Travel Game w/ all extensions
Limited run Kickstarter-exclusive playable character card
FREE worldwide shipping!

support.title: LIBRARIAN - ALEXANDRIA basic
support.descp:
(~25,50 EUR)
The basic edition of Alexandria with cardboard tokens.
If the game makes it to retail, this would be the version most likely to be in shops.
For custom-cut wooden components, please select one of the deluxe pledge levels.
Click here to see shipping costs to your country.
Please note that we may need to make some or all pledge levels unavailable, if we need to determine the total print run and deliver on time.
Pledge anything extra you can spare if you like what we do, or if you want to contribute towards the real shipping costs. Many thanks if you do!
To be the first to know about future campaigns, sign up at http://ludicreations.com/newsletter

support.title: SCHOLAR - ALEXANDRIA DELUXE
support.descp:
(~41,65 EUR)
The Deluxe edition of Alexandria with custom-shaped wooden tokens.
If/When previous levels are locked down, then pledging at this level would be needed to get the game.
If/When the game is improved during the campaign this pledge level will be locked down.
Pledge here from the beginning, if you want to give us a head start at covering the costs of the game.
Click here to see shipping costs to your country.
Please note that we may need to make some or all pledge levels unavailable, if we need to determine the total print run and deliver on time.
Pledge anything extra you can spare if you like what we do, or if you want to contribute towards the real shipping costs. Many thanks if you do!
To be the first to know about future campaigns, sign up at http://ludicreations.com/newsletter

support.title: MERCHANT
support.descp:
If you are a MERCHANT, you can pledge this level and we will reach out to you directly with retail pricing and options for your stores. This pledge will be credited towards any order.
Or you can scroll down to the retailer section on this page and use the contact email.
Thank you.

support.title: BAG OF HOLDING
support.descp:
One (1) of the Archmage game/dice bags. The bag is made of cloth and silk screened with mage logos and Archmage title word. Approximately 8 inches tall and 6 inches wide.
This reward level includes shipping.
